required.description: 100ms App Access Key (also called App ID) from https://dashboard.100ms.live/
required.prompt: Enter your 100ms App Access Key (find it in the 100ms Dashboard > Developer Settings)
Enter your 100ms App Secret (find it in the 100ms Dashboard > Developer Settings)
Enter your 100ms Template ID (create a voice-only template in the 100ms Dashboard > Templates section)

optional.description: Google OAuth Client ID for authentication
